title: Bug 6536: Javadoc not being added to fields in Type Hierarchy view
OB: When trying to add Javadoc to a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens.
EB: When trying to add Javadoc to a field in the Type Hierarchy view, the Javadoc should be successfully added to the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the view. 3. Attempt to add Javadoc to the selected field. 4. Note that the Javadoc is not added and nothing happens.
